{{ardayearheader: * The [[Vanyar]] and the [[Noldor]] reach [[Valinor]] and establish [[Eldamar]]. The [[Valar]] open the rift of [[Calacirya]] in the [[Pelóri]] so that the [[Light of Valinor]] reaches Eldamar. The [[Elves]] begin the building of [[Tirion]] on the hill of [[Túna]] inside Calacirya.<ref>{{AA
